title: The Ville Grill - Wild Mushroom
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Italian, Buffet, Salad bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Wild Mushroom is a station in the Ville Grill specifically for vegetarians and vegans. Vegans need to ask to omit cheese on vegetarian items. Salad bar contains mixed herbs, spinach, or romaine for your base and copious amounts of toppings. Also has a potato bar and a dessert area, vegan smoothies made with soy milk and vegan sorbet. Brunch on weekends.
